Acrylic painting by Mathias Kauage featuring the artist as a child being injected at primary school, the children�s faces nearby look on. Signed �Kauage 1969 1990� on lower right.
Condition- good with areas of uneven pigment cover at edges and the colours from layers beneath are visible. Stretcher in good condition, with �Mk 97� and �32� written in black marker on the rear.
Print, framed and glazed, untitled, black and brown felt-tip on paper. Image shows a humaniod figure with a bird and quadruped. Signed �AKIS�.
A perspective view of number 48 Cheyne Walk, showing the ground and first floors. This house dates from circa 1711.
A large Victorian house on the bank of the River Thames.
Detail of one of the Early Bronze Age flat axes carved on stone 53.
